Package org.neo4j.internal.id

Class IdValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.internal.id.IdValidator
  • public final class IdValidator
extends Object
    Utility containing methods to validate ids generated by IdGenerator. Takes into account special reserved value INTEGER_MINUS_ONE.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static long INTEGER_MINUS_ONE
      Invalid and reserved id value.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      private IdValidator()

      Asserts that the given id is valid with respect to given max id: non-negative less than the given max id
      static void assertIdWithinMaxCapacity​(IdType idType, long id, long maxId)  
      static void assertValidId​(IdType idType, long id, long maxId)
      Asserts that the given id is valid: non-negative less than the given max id not equal to INTEGER_MINUS_ONE
      static boolean hasReservedIdInRange​(long startIdInclusive, long endIdExclusive)

      Checks if the given id is reserved, i.e.

    • Field Detail

      • INTEGER_MINUS_ONE

        public static final long INTEGER_MINUS_ONE
        Invalid and reserved id value. Represents special values, f.ex. the end of a relationships/property chain. Please use IdValidator to validate generated ids.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • IdValidator

        private IdValidator()

    • Method Detail

      • isReservedId

        public static boolean isReservedId​(long id)
        Checks if the given id is reserved, i.e. INTEGER_MINUS_ONE.
        Parameters:
        id - the id to check.
        Returns:
        true if the given id is INTEGER_MINUS_ONE, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        INTEGER_MINUS_ONE

      • assertValidId

        public static void assertValidId​(IdType idType,
                                 long id,
                                 long maxId)
        Asserts that the given id is valid:
        • non-negative
        • less than the given max id
        • not equal to INTEGER_MINUS_ONE
        Parameters:
        id - the id to check.
        maxId - the max allowed id.
        See Also:
        INTEGER_MINUS_ONE

      • assertIdWithinCapacity

        public static void assertIdWithinCapacity​(IdType idType,
                                          long id,
                                          long maxId)
        Asserts that the given id is valid with respect to given max id:
        • non-negative
        • less than the given max id
        Parameters:
        idType -
        id - the id to check.
        maxId - the max allowed id.

        public static void assertIdWithinMaxCapacity​(IdType idType,

                                             long maxId)
